text: Nandao ni [mu sheng] bu zhidao ma? Naxie ren [wei xinzhe] wangcheng tamen quexin jiang shi ni de jingdian he zai ni zhiqian suo jiang shi de jingdian, jinguan tamen yi fengming buke xiangxin emo, dan tamen reng xiwang xiang emo xunqiu caijue, er emo que xiwang ba tamen yinru shenyuan de mi wu zhong.
